forum.content: X'mas night is a night to join your family for supper. To hold each other and say you love them. To forgive, and to let go. Whichever made you bad feelings leave them behind. Sleep well and tight tonight. May your sock fill with jollo surprise next morning. Don't forget to say the magic words everyone you see. Wish ya'all shall have a warm warm wonderful holiday.
forum.title: Season greetings
